name: Subscription Tracker
description: Never forget about your subscriptions again!A Notion template that helps you keep track of your subscriptions, so you never forget to renew or cancel them.What's inside? Set reminders for subscription renewal Group subscriptions by categories e.g. entertainment, education, business Calculate monthly & yearly expenses for each category View subscriptions by their status
features: Set reminders for subscription renewal; Group subscriptions by categories e.g. entertainment, education, business; Calculate monthly & yearly expenses for each category; View subscriptions by their status

rawData.description: Never forget about your subscriptions again!A Notion template that helps you keep track of your subscriptions, so you never forget to renew or cancel them.What's inside? Set reminders for subscription renewal Group subscriptions by categories e.g. entertainment, education, business Calculate monthly & yearly expenses for each category View subscriptions by their status
features: Group subscriptions by categories e.g. entertainment, education, business
Calculate monthly & yearly expenses for each category

enhancedContent.overview: A comprehensive Notion template designed to help individuals and small businesses maintain complete visibility over their recurring subscriptions. Perfect for anyone looking to eliminate surprise charges and optimize their monthly spending by organizing, tracking, and managing all subscription services in one centralized dashboard.

features: Categorize services by type (entertainment, productivity, business)

problemsSolved: Forgotten subscriptions leading to unwanted charges and budget overruns
Lack of visibility into total monthly and annual subscription spending
Difficulty managing renewal dates and cancellation windows across multiple services
Disorganized subscription information scattered across different platforms
solutionsBenefits: Gain complete financial control with clear spending breakdowns and category-based analysis
Never miss important renewal dates with proactive reminder systems
Make informed decisions about subscription value with organized cost tracking
Reduce unnecessary expenses by identifying unused or redundant services
idealFor: Budget-conscious individuals managing multiple streaming and software subscriptions
Small business owners tracking various business tools and services
Freelancers and solopreneurs optimizing their monthly expenses
Anyone seeking better financial organization and subscription accountability
notRecommendedFor: Users with only 1-2 subscriptions (too simple for this system)
Those preferring automated bank-connected expense tracking tools
whatsIncluded: Pre-built subscription tracking database with customizable fields
Automated calculation formulas for monthly and yearly totals
Category-based organization system with common subscription types
Status tracking views for active, cancelled, and expiring subscriptions
Reminder and notification templates for renewal management

faqs.question: Can I customize this template?
faqs.answer: Yes, the template is fully customizable. You can modify categories, add custom fields, adjust calculation formulas, and personalize the layout to match your specific subscription tracking needs.

faqs.question: Do I need Notion AI to use this?
faqs.answer: No, this template works with standard Notion functionality and doesn't require Notion AI features. All calculations and organization tools use basic Notion database properties and formulas.

faqs.question: How complex is the setup?
faqs.answer: Setup is straightforward and beginner-friendly. Simply duplicate the template, input your subscription details, and customize categories as needed. Most users can get started within 15-30 minutes.

faqs.question: Is this updated for 2026?
faqs.answer: Yes, the template uses current Notion features and database structures that are compatible with the latest Notion updates and will continue working as Notion evolves.

faqs.question: What if I need help?
faqs.answer: The template includes setup instructions and usage guidelines. For additional support, most template creators provide email support or community access for troubleshooting and customization help.
